DataElement.preferredName: Standard Operating Procedure Whole Cell Pellet Formation Processing Follow Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the minimum volume of blood expected to yield the aliquots required for the study was collected from the participant.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An established procedure to be followed in carrying out a given operation or in a given situation._Including all components without exception; constituting the full amount or extent or duration; complete._A cell sample collected and compacted by centrifugation of a liquid suspension._The act of forming something or the structure formed._The act of preparing or putting through a prescribed procedure._Adhere to or practice.
